## ElementCSSBoxDimensions.verticalScrollbarWidth property

The width of the vertical scrollbar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verticalScrollbarWidth: number;
```

## Remarks

In the CSS Box model, scrollbars are part of the content box.
